item.name: Used for asking the sender to perform additional verification of the recipient before payment on Digital Disbursement Platform.

request.name: Used for asking the sender to perform additional verification of the recipient before payment on Digital Disbursement Platform.

description.content: Used for asking the sender to perform additional verification of the recipient before payment on Digital Disbursement Platform.

header.description: (Required) An API key is a string value passed by a client app to the API proxies. The key uniquely identifies the client app.
(Required) Epoch timestamp in the request initiating system

(Required) Contains a unique ID generated by the client that can be used for enforcing idempotency on POST actions. POSTs are inherently non-idempotent and submitting the exact same request multiple times would create duplicate resources.
Note:- Omitting this header increases the risk of duplicate transactions.
(Required) An API key is a string value passed by a client app to the API proxies. The key uniquely identifies the client app.
(Required) Epoch timestamp in the request initiating system
(Required) Authorization information for the request. Format- `HMAC {hmacToken}`

(Required) Contains a unique ID generated by the client that can be used for enforcing idempotency on POST actions. POSTs are inherently non-idempotent and submitting the exact same request multiple times would create duplicate resources.
Note:- Omitting this header increases the risk of duplicate transactions.
(Required) used to indicate the media type of the resource.
